org.fax4j.spi.windows
Class WindowsFaxClientSpiHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.fax4j.spi.windows.WindowsFaxClientSpiHelper

public final class WindowsFaxClientSpiHelper
extends Object

This is a helper class for the windows based SPIs.

Since:
0.41.5
Version:
1.02
Author:
Sagie Gur-Ari

Field Summary
static Object NATIVE_LOCK
          The lock used to synchronize native calls
 
Method Summary
static void extractNativeResources()
          This function extracts the native resources (the fax4j.exe and fax4j.dll) and pushes them to the fax4j temporary directory.

          This function returns the fax job ID (if valid).

          This function returns the relevant part from the process output.

Method Detail

extractNativeResources

public static void extractNativeResources()
This function extracts the native resources (the fax4j.exe and fax4j.dll) and pushes them to the fax4j temporary directory.

loadNativeLibrary

public static void loadNativeLibrary(Logger logger)
Loads the native library if not loaded before.

Parameters:
logger - The logger

isNativeLibraryLoaded

public static boolean isNativeLibraryLoaded()
This function returns true if the native library was loaded.

Returns:
True if the native library was loaded

getServerNameFromConfiguration

public static String getServerNameFromConfiguration(FaxClientSpi faxClientSpi)
This function returns the server name from the SPI configuration.

Parameters:
faxClientSpi - The fax client SPI
Returns:
The server name

getFaxJobID

public static int getFaxJobID(FaxJob faxJob)
This function returns the fax job ID (if valid). If fax job ID is not valid, an error will be thrown.

Parameters:
faxJob - The fax job object
Returns:
The fax job ID

validateFaxJobID

public static void validateFaxJobID(FaxJob faxJob)
This function validates the provided fax job ID (not checking fax server, only format). In case of an invalid ID, an error will be thrown.

Parameters:
faxJob - The fax job holding the ID to validate

validateFaxJobID

public static void validateFaxJobID(String faxJobID)
This function validates the provided fax job ID (not checking fax server, only format). In case of an invalid ID, an error will be thrown.

Parameters:
faxJobID - The fax job ID to validate

validateFaxJobID

public static void validateFaxJobID(int faxJobID)
This function validates the provided fax job ID (not checking fax server, only format). In case of an invalid ID, an error will be thrown.

Parameters:
faxJobID - The fax job ID to validate

getFaxJobStatusFromWindowsFaxJobStatusString

public static FaxJobStatus getFaxJobStatusFromWindowsFaxJobStatusString(String faxJobStatusStr)
This function returns the fax job status based on the windows fax job status string value.

Parameters:
faxJobStatusStr - The fax job status string value
Returns:
The fax job status

getOutputPart

public static String getOutputPart(ProcessExecutorHelper.ProcessOutput processOutput,
                                   String prefix)
This function returns the relevant part from the process output.

Parameters:
processOutput - The process output
prefix - The prefix to look for in the output
Returns:
The relevant output part
